clueCol2.question: Why doesn't Dusty see the snowmobile that causes his first tangle?
clueCol2.answer: Was it a blind corner, so he couldn't see it?
options: Was it the ice was slick so the dogs fell?
Was it a moose so he was distracted?
Was it a blind corner, so he couldn't see it?

clueCol2.question: Why are rumors spreading that Dusty mistreated his dogs?
clueCol2.answer: Was it because he ran so fast?
options: Was it because his dogs look exhausted?
Was it because none of them are wearing their booties?
Was it because he ran so fast?

clueCol2.question: Which part of the trail has Dusty never done before?
clueCol2.answer: Was it the beginning section in the woods?
options: Was it the middle section of the forest?
Was it the beginning section in the woods?
Was it the end of the trail with the lake?

clueCol2.answer: Was it both allow racers of all ages?

Was it both allow racers of all ages?
Was it both start and finish in different parts of Alaska?

clueCol2.answer: Was it he saw a moose on the trail?

Was it the trail was crowded with obstacles?
